variables.name: BI_EE_HOME
variables.description:
This path should be the path of your OBIEE install
Previous path (11g) - '/app/oracle/biee/instances/instance1/bifoundation/OracleBIServerComponent/coreapplication_obis1'
Current Path (12c) - /app/oracle/biee/bi/bifoundation/server/

variables.name: DB_HOST
variables.description: This host information should be the computer name (or IP) of your db host.

variables.name: DB_USERNAME
variables.description: This string should be the db login for BISAMPLE schema

variables.name: DB_SID
variables.description: This should be the SID number of your db host.

variables.name: DB_PORT
variables.description: This should be the port number of your db host.
